title: The Dynamics of a Circle and a Line
author: Meru Video
full_text: the hand model that makes the Hebrew Greek in it well we've done the Hebrew Hebrew letters this is the fluid rabbinic form of the rubra surest letters is nothing but a circle and a line pulled up into three day now there are fancier ways to make it one can make it using a mathematical curve known as the reciprocal spiral a reciprocal spiral starts out as a straight line asymptotic to y equals 1 dead straight and ends up making a perfect circle as it strangles the origin again mediating between a line and a circle between losing country between singularity and wholeness between the one and the many let me just read you up from a chart I think is sitting here I'll give you some of the examples of this embodiment if I can find one of it here it is there's rabbinic texts that talk about these as the extreme alternatives in philosophy this would be the one in the many and whatever they can to get one the one God and the whole inclusive the one Lord and the whole God this could be the particle and wave this could be as above so below and of course if we look at the if the earth plane is also what goes around comes around we are looking at line and circle Lord and God Sun and shield Sun and sky pillar and cloud thumb and fingers mind and warp mind and world a light flame and Lantern prophet and disciples that's going to be a circle of 12 when you when you actually make the full not out with all the fingers of the hand turns out there's 12 on the circle so there's 12 houses 12 prophets map table fossils 12 tribes 12 Imams 12 hours day 12 hours night the mountain and and the K this is the mountain this is the cave we have ass caliber and the round table conductor in Orchestra monochord and and and the octave DNA in the organs same in different all the linear extensions as compliments to all of the spherical circular expansions circle in line how do you square circle with a straight edge and a compass was not doable it can't be done mathematically but it was pointing to the fact that the alphabet comes from trying to do it putting a circle and a line together
